front.extra:
... Respondents in W.P. No.21436 of 2019
Prayer in W.P. No.8180 of 2019: Writ Petition filed under Article 226 of the
Constitution of India praying to issue a Writ of Mandamus directing
respondents 1 and 2 to evacuate the third respondent in encroachments
of the general path and to ensure the petitioner to utilise the same to
cultivate the petitioner's land based on the petitioner's representation
dated 28.08.2018.
Prayer in W.P. No.21436 of 2019: Writ Petition filed under Article 226 of
the Constitution of India praying to issue a Writ of Certiorarified
Mandamus calling for the records with respect of the impugned order
passed by the first respondent in his Proceedings dated 12.07.2019 in
Ka.No.01/2018/U.Pe/dated 12.07.2019 and quash the same, consequently
direct the first respondent to survey the entire extent of the property
comprised in Survey No.217 at Romapuri Village, Cuddalore District and
other lands which are encroached by the second respondent and others
and thereafter pass appropriate orders after providing sufficient
opportunity to the petitioner and others.
For Petitioner in W.P.
No.8180 of 2019 and for R2 in
